document.full_text: a stubborn 5-day-old wildfire that has forced hundreds of people to flee their homes in eastern arizona grew dramatically to 106,000 acres on friday, claiming as many as seven dwellings, officials said.
document.title: wildfire consumes homes in eastern arizona
lines_and_colors: a stubborn 5-day-old wildfire that has forced hundreds of people to flee their homes in eastern arizona grew dramatically to 106,000 acres on friday, claiming as many as seven dwellings, officials said.
